    • Hello! I'm

    Chaopin Wen.

    I build things for the web.

    Results-driven Software and DevOps Engineer with a strong track record of building scalable web applications and automating cloud infrastructure on AWS. Proficient in designing CI/CD pipelines (GitHubActions), orchestrating containerized microservices (ECS), and implementing infrastructure as code (CloudFormation). Proven success in reducing deployment downtime, cutting release cycles by 40%, and leveraging system monitoring (CloudWatch) to ensure reliable, low-downtime deployments across eCommerce, logistics, and real-time systems.

    01. ABOUT

    I'm Chaopin Wen, a DevOps-focused Full-Stack Engineer with over 9 years of experience delivering scalable, automation-driven solutions across logistics, eCommerce, and enterprise operations. With a background in Electrical and Computer Engineering, I specialize in building reliable infrastructure, automating deployments, and integrating AI into real-world systems to drive operational efficiency.

    Proficient in JavaScript (React, Node.js), Python, and PHP (Laravel), I've architected full-stack applications and orchestrated microservices using AWS ECS Fargate, CloudFormation, and CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions). At Unis Fulfillment, I led the development of an AI-powered Yard Management System with real-time truck tracking, OCR-based container verification, and robot patrol automation—reducing manual processes and boosting warehouse visibility.

    From optimizing pet food subscription platforms to deploying autonomous robots, I thrive at the intersection of system automation, infrastructure scalability, and developer productivity. I’m equally passionate about frontend architecture—building modular, reusable UI systems and streamlining team workflows through CI/CD and containerization.

    When I'm not automating workflows or debugging edge devices, I'm probably cycling up mountain trails or jamming on the drums.

    03. EXPERIENCE

    Unis Fulfillment
    Jan 2023 - Present
    Software & DevOps Engineer
    • Spearheaded the DevOps lifecycle for the Warehouse Management System (WMS), automating end-to-end deployments using GitHub Actions, Docker, and AWS ECS, reducing manual intervention and cutting release cycles by 40%.
    • Orchestrated 10+ WMS microservices across dev/stage/prod environments using ECS Fargate and ECR, achieving near-zero deployment downtime.
    • Designed and implemented CloudFormation IaC templates to standardize infrastructure provisioning, ensure consistency and enable version controlled.
    • Built and deployed containerized AI services for OCR document recognition, RFID scan ingestion, and robot patrol telemetry, scaling reliably on ECS.
    • Enhanced observability with CloudWatch dashboards for logs, metrics, and health checks, improving system reliability and incident response time.
    • Automated OS-level updates and diagnostics for 20+ Linux-based edge devices (e.g., RFID readers, robotic units) using Bash scripting and SSH workflows.
    • • Led the development of branch-based preview environments to accelerate testing and cross-functional collaboration for feature delivery.
    Centinela Feed & Pet Supplies
    Nov 2021 - Jan 2023
    Full Stack Web Developer
    • Fully customized web application via React/NodeJS with PostgreSQL database and bundle by Webpack.
    • Implement eCommerce features, integrate third party apps through REST API, includes Mailchimp, Stripe and Shippo. Create admin dashboard, blog, store locator, and quiz game for gift redemption.
    • Migrate and rebuild current site on Salesforce Commerce Cloud platform. Customize pet Feeding Calculator and integrate Service Cloud, Zenkraft(Bringg), and Yotpo review apps to achieve full eCommerce experience.
    XPOWER Manufacture Inc.
    Mar 2017 - Oct 2021
    Web Developer
    • Create and update web applications written in PHP, using CRUD operation interacting MySQL databases.
    • Code front-end applications using industry standard HTML/CSS to form the basic architecture, structure and layout of a website and use JavaScript/jQuery to perform DOM manipulation and add dynamic functionality.
    • Collaborate with design and development leads to create full websites and applications from scratch. Turning PSD file into fully functional e-commerce website. Responsive Web Design across all devices.
    • Customize website via Prestashop, WordPress WooCommerce platform. Design and implement new features and functionality. Ensure high-performance and availability and manage all technical aspects of the CMS.
    Cybertan Crop.
    Sep 2012 - Mar 2014
    Application Engineer
    • Participate in review meetings, provide input, receive feedback and implement necessary changes for system design and code reviews.
    • Participate in Dev integration testing, coordinate with other teams for software releases to test and stage production environments.
    • Provide on-site VLSI hardware schematic review/demonstration with customers. Perform hardware analysis and interact with engineering development teams to provide solutions to complex issues.
